duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide nursing care in a Level II Trauma center, specializing in the GI department with the ability to float to Outpatient Endoscopy as needed.
Ensure patient safety and wellbeing by delivering high-quality and compassionate care in accordance with professional nursing standards.
Work flexible shifts, including days and PMs, with occasional earlier start times based on staffing needs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Nursing (RN) with current CA RN license
